title: “Characterisation of patients with interstitial pneumonia with autoimmune features.” Justin M. Oldham, Ayodeji Adegunsoye, Eleanor Valenzi, Cathryn Lee, Leah Witt, Lena Chen, Aliya N. Husain, Steven Montner, Jonathan H. Chung, Vincent Cottin, Aryeh Fischer, Imre Noth, Rekha Vij and Mary E. Strek. Eur Respir J 2016; 47: 1767–1775.
